articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Observed in Italy 
    Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- A seminar titled "Independence, Peace and Self-reliance to Cope with Globalization" was held at University of Rome on May 19 on the occasion of the 41st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 Present there were members of organizations including the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Italian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy and figures in academic circles of Italy and Denmark.    
 The floor was taken by Bruno Amoroso, deputy director general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, Guiseppe Amata, chief of the Catania Branch of the Italian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, and others under the titles "Independence, Peace and Self-reliance are a basic way of overcoming globalization" and "Let's boost economic assistance and cooperation against the U.S. imper ialists' moves for globalization" and so on.
 Speakers disclosed the reactionary nature of the U.S. moves for globalization and its consequences at present and underscored the need to strengthen the worldwide and regional cooperation and solidarity to check them.

articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun Meets New Equatorial Guinean Ambassador 
    Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, minister of Foreign Affairs, today met and had a talk with new Equatorial Guinean Ambassador e. p. to the DPRK Narciso Ntugu Abeso Oyana who paid a courtesy call on him.
